meta.@content: Geo-referenced Pearl Harbor Navigation Aids, using Prototypes: Range Light, Lighted Buoy, Light, LightPost, Daybeacon.
Planet 9 Studios, Inc., San Francisco, CA
Christian Greuel, Director of Art and Production
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding
